title: Super Bowl LIV Recap: Chiefs, Mahomes erase 4th quarter deficit to defeat 49ers 31-20 and win 1st title in 50 years (Football 2/3)
description:
After 50 years of waiting, the Kansas City Chiefs are Super Bowl champions once again, but it didn't appear that way in the 4th quarter...Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech, Sean Wagner-McGough and Jared Dubin break down all angles from Chiefs-49ers in Super Bowl LIV. The guys discuss KC's comeback paired with San Francisco's collapse, the coaching performances from Andy Reid and Kyle Shanahan, and the back-and-forth QB play from Patrick Mahomes and Jimmy Garoppolo. Did Mahomes really deserve to win MVP? Where should the blame be place for the Niners? The Pick Six Superfriends cover all the moments that mattered from Miami including the halftime show from Jennifer Lopez and Shakira. Finally, the biggest winners and losers from this year's Super Bowl.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: The Chiefs are Super Bowl Champions. Will Brinson and the Pick Six Superfriends recap Super Bowl LIV and how KC was crowned.
